phrs.translation: 突降法, 平凡而陈腐风格, 比小法, 别煞事

sentences.sentence: He'll never be able to emerge from his bathos of coarseness and ignorance.
sentences.translation: 他永远也不能从他那粗野无知中解脱出来。
